unifies OpenAI, Claude, Gemini APIs for LLMs

Related repos

  • Open-source tools for running and improving LLM applications—gateway, observability, data feedback, optimization
  • Open-source framework for building stateful LLM applications
  • Converts client-only LLM requests to OpenAI-compatible API
  • auto-switches llama.cpp models for OpenAI API requests
  • Converts Gemini CLI to OpenAI API
